Review Text:
Good option when u want to have a simple home cooked food.
I forgot my lunch once so I thought of giving it a try.
I ordered veg thali which was simple and tasty. It came in a fancy packing which included dal makhani, mix veg, zeera rice ,paratha and halwa.
Must try.
I ordered paneer paratha. The packaging was good bt the paratha was not stuffed well at all. Half of it is like plain paratha only without any taste.

Great place to order authentic North Indian food. They have masterfully designed combos presented beautifully. Ordered butter chicken thali.... I really liked the taste and packaging.
Also saw healthie thali options which I generally don't see often. Definitely will try next time.

I and my friends had ordered a couple of thalis from this place last weekend. We had ordered the butter chicken thali and the kadhai paneer thali. The Dal makhani and the gravies were yum!! Give it a try

Placed an order for Thali for dinner. It came on time as committed and was served fresh and hot. Paranthas was cooked properly and onion salsa was a good add on. I also love the beverages optios they have in menu. Would try out soon.

I ordered my lunch from here that is Shahi paneer thali. Food and it's flavour was delicious, thalis was proper packed and I got my order in 30 minutes.
good meal and worth meal overall. Will order again soon from here.

Recently, I ordered paneer bhurji and dal makhani thali from here and trust me taste was yummm!! I loved the packaging and order delivery as it came on time and delivery guy was polite too. For sure, would recommend it to my friends and family.
Ordered the shahi paneer with dal makhani thali, it was quite good. The quantity was sufficient, the taste was really good. The packaging was also good, it was sent nicely!
Few days back I have placed an order for Idli Sambhar. Sambhar was yummm and Idli was soft. Meal delivered hot and order delivered on time. Amazing experience
I really liked the Kadhai Chicekn and Butter chicken combos with Dal Makhani. Great outlet to order North Indian food from here. Will surely recommend to others. Keep up the good work team.

We were planning a Lunch party at home for 6-7 people and were too confused with the food. We made a plan to order some snacks with good thalis. While navigating, we came across this outlet called Thalis of India. We ordered snacks like Idli Sambhar, Vada Sambhar and main dishes like Kadhai Chicken Dal Makhai thalis and many more, and yes Shakes too.
Order delivered in around 1 hour, it was worth to wait for 60 minutes. Food was yummy and we all loved the packaging.
Awesome experience overall with them.

I was navigating the site and found Thalis of India. Good varities of dishes in the menu. So thought to give a try. I ordered Idli Sambar. My order delivery time was 50 minutes and it came before time. I'm impressed with the packaging part. Coming to food quality, sambhar flavor was amazing. Overall a delicious meal.

One of my Friend, recommended this outlet. I have placed an order for Shahi Paneer and Dal Makhani thali.
Food quality was Superb, Flavors were nice and no doubt packaging was excellent. kudos!!

I am not a pretty fan of Thali,But in Thalis of India
I tried shahi paneer and dal makhni thali,Am not a big fan of paneer but the shahi paneer gravy was spicy & sweet and i loved it also the dal makhni was good,
The jeera rice and flaky parathas were good and apart from these there's a salsa and a small sweet,Overall it can be more good in terms of quantity as i have a little big tummy ðŸ˜‹

Last night, I ordered Kadhai Chicken and Dal Makhani Thali along with Modinagar ki Shikanji. I must appreciate the Kitchen to deliver the order on time. Food was served hot, fresh and delicious. I'm quite happy with the quantity too. Will be ordering soon from here again.

One of my friend recommended me to order from here. Last night i ordered Chicken 65 + Paneer thali and it was above my expectation. Chicken65 was served fresh and it was super yummy. Coming to the combo now it was a perfect combo and quantity was enough to fulfill the hunger. Itâ€™s a must try out.

Recently I have placed an order for Butter Chicken and Dal Makhani Thali and this experience was amazing.Â Coming to the rating part,Â Packaging 5/5 (meal was packed nicely, no leakage nothing)Â 
Delivery 5/5 (Order came on time, rider was polite and well groomed)
Food Quality 5/5 (Color, thickness and taste of gravy was just wow!, Dal Makhani - Dal was mashed and cooked properly)Â 
Overall, a nice experience and worthy meal. Will surely recommend to others.
Ordered veg Thali itâ€™s very tasty perfect place for North Indian food also delivery on time and nice packing..... as per the quality and quantity wise also perfect....

Ordered paneer thali...... Which comes with proper quantity..... I loved the food soo much from this outlet and it is my first choice whenever I think of some good food, homely food I always order from you guys
Today searching for a indian food so I was found the restaurant name thali of India...............I ordered butter chicken & dal makhni thali............it's a very goodfood point.
Delicious food........... Delivered well before to the delivery time.... The food was served with full of indian authentic flavour... Really recommended to every food lover.

Absolutely awful experience. Thought of trying this place today evening so I ordered a Dal tadka and Veg jalfrezi thali.
There was nothing working in favour of thali in terms of both service and food quality. I almost waited an hour for the food. Their veg jalfrezi was super salty and quite runny and dal tadka was bland in taste. Even if I could possibly ignore these aspects, I cannot expect the breads to be raw. Paranthas served were unfit for consumption. The photos are attached for reference.
Don't try this place at all guys.
The packaging is changed but not the quality and I loved the food soo much from this outlet and it is my first choice whenever I think of some good food, homely food I always order from you guys.
The delivery was slight late but the daal makhni thali is always the best. This outlet and it is my first choice for homely food I always order from you guys.
I loved the beet it chicken thali and as it was flavourful and the salad was also super tangy which was complementing the food finely. The delivery was slight late, but worth the wait.
Beet it veg is the the best. Recommended by my friends. Must say had an amazing experience. The quality and quantity is worth the price. I will also recommend to other people.
Dal makhni Thali is my favourite one and it was really good and delicious. It came in  a decent packaging which I liked it and was served with a sweet. Canâ€™t wait to check out more from the menu.
Love the Kadhai paneer thali. It was really good. Came fresh and hot and it the packaging was wonderful. 5 star for this one. Canâ€™t wait to try more from the menu

Ordered Panneer 65 and sambhar thali and i love the taste of it. It was super delicious and delivered in time. Keep it up guys! Will be ordering soon and will definitely recommend this to my friends and colleagues.
I am paying 250 bucks and even spoon is not there in thali. This is my favourite resto and i always give 5star but today i will not give 5 star due to not giving me spoon
The Kadhai paneer with lachha parantha  was the one I would love to order again and again. Iâ€™m a big foodie and will always find a way to good food. Keep it up guys.

Treid it for the first time and was not expecting very much but the way I was served was super impressive... I ordered Shahi paneer and dal makhni thali and the quality and quantity I received was great. Super delivery and service! Great taste!

I was craving forÂ  some home cooked food so I ordered a Thali from here. Firstly the packing was so good and the food was out of the box!! I would recommend to all the people who miss home cooked food.
nice taste at affordable price.

Ordered kadhi paneer thali.. Got 2 table spoon of sabzi and rajma with lot of rice and paratha. How do you expect to eat so much rice with so less rajma and sabzi? Overpriced.
Please use your good mind and check your parcel containers. It definitely requires a bigger size pockets for sabzis and dal/rajma. Food is average and overpriced.
PS - zomato failed once again in delivering food on time. Food wasnt even warm enough to eat.
Okay food
The quantity of dal tadka and paneer bhurji was very less as per rice and 2 parathas. The quality was not that good.
Did not receive watermelon as mentioned in the order

Paneer butter masala Thali.
contained Paneer curry, dal makhani, 2 flaky rotis. all these were okay. But rice was clearly raw. Half cooked and packed and sent. Disappointing.
order not delivered yet
Ordered a Rajma Thali. They've maintained the north indian taste. Rajma was very well made. This is the best rajma I've had in a very long time. Parathas could've been softer but great food overall.
Chutney and taste is bad
i had to eat ice cold food because of bad packaging. Rice was not properly cooked
Food is good and as described

Food was ok. The packaging is good.. but i didn't like the thing that thali was handed to me openly. it should have been inside a cover atleast. Quantity wise, i felt curries are little less to complete rice and 2-lachha parantha.. taste wise it is OK, but Chole can still be improved.
one star less coz the order said jeera rice however I received plain rice.

I ordered Rajma thali which cost me around 100, the food was worth for money in terms of Taste and Quantity. The food was delicious, if someone has above average diet they should opt for this. The best part was I asked the restaurant if they can offer me extra Lacha Paratha instead of rice, which they accepted humbly..
ordered Shahi Paneer thali....it was very tasty
Great job mujahid before time delivery good behaviour
Idli was stinking.. first meal of the day and they have disappointed. Awful experience. Please don't deliver spoiled food, it can really lead to health issues
too salty.
fast delivery
aloo parantha was nicely stuffed and was tasty

Ordered Kochi Chicken Pepper Fry thali.
Food 4-5 (Flavours were very nice and food was hot)
Packaging 5-5 (Was nicely packaged, didn't need to use any cutlery from home)
Delivery - 5-5 ( Delivered in 30 minutes)
worst food. we ordered some chole thali. they sent spoiled curry I guess it's leftover night curry. masala dosa was worst.
